title: Shinsei Kourin Dacryon Luna

alternative_titles.ja: 神聖昂燐ダクリュオン・ルナ

synopsis: Cute friends Runa, Raina and Miyu study at the prestigious private school Etoile and spend a lot of time together doing a variety of teenage activities. As members of a journalism club, the girls downloaded an app called Angel Maker, which proved challenging. It was cursed by fallen angels, and the girlfriends received magical powers. As they say, with new power comes new responsibility. Ugly monsters sensed the newfound magic, and from that moment began the tireless struggle of brave magical girls for goodness and justice.
